Back to Alexander Scriabin

Alexander Scriabin

Sonata no. 3 in F-sharp minor, op. 23

1897–1898

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 19' 30"

  • 1. Drammatico
  • 2. Allegretto
  • 3. Andante
  • 4. Presto con fuoco

Recommended editions

  • Collected Works (Muzyka/Jurgenson) · II/10 · Sonatas · ed. Pavel Shatsky
  • Bärenreiter · BA 9616 · Sämtliche Klaviersonaten I · ed. Christoph Flamm
  • Henle · HN 1331 · Klaviersonaten Nr. 1–10 · ed. Valentina Rubtsova
  • Henle · HN 1109 · ed. Valentina Rubtsova
  • Könemann · K 263 · Sonatas I · ed. Victor Ekimovsky
  • Peters · EP 9077e · Klavierwerke V / Sonaten Nr. 1–5 · ed. Günter Philipp

1. Drammatico

Duration: 6' 30"

Difficulty: 4.5

2. Allegretto

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 4

3. Andante

This movement leads into the next without pause.

Duration: 5'

Difficulty: 3.5

4. Presto con fuoco

Duration: 5' 30"

Difficulty: 5
